model_answer: The correct answer is A: [00:02:26 - 00:03:13]. TheAbout screen showing the user repeatedly tapping the Build number occurs from 00:02:26 to 00:03:13 in the audio.
The relevant segment is from [00:06:28 - 00:07:45], where the narrator mentions seeing the phone listed as unauthorized in ADB and instructs to unplug the phone.
